doc:
Charlotte Coleman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charlotte_Coleman 0 Charlotte Ninon Coleman (3 April 1968 – 14 November 2001) was an English actress best known for playing Scarlett in the film Four Weddings and a Funeral, Jess in the television drama Oranges Are Not the Only Fruit, and her childhood roles of Sue in Worzel Gummidge and the character Marmalade Atkins. Coleman died of an acute asthma attack in Holloway, North London, aged 33. Charlotte_Ninon_Coleman ( 3_April_1968 – 14_November_2001 ) was an_English_actress best_known for playing Scarlett in the_film_Four_Weddings and a_Funeral_,_Jess in the_television_drama_Oranges Are Not the_Only_Fruit , and her_childhood_roles of Sue in Worzel_Gummidge and the_character_Marmalade_Atkins . Coleman died of an_acute_asthma_attack in Holloway , North_London , aged_33 .
